## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description          | Type                             | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | -------------------- | -------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `breakpoint` | `breakpoint` | Container breakpoint | `"is-fullhd" or "is-widescreen"` | `undefined` |
| `class`      | `class`      | CSS Classes          | `string`                         | `''`        |
| `isFluid`    | `is-fluid`   | Fluid container      | `boolean`                        | `false`     |
